description: California Vehicle Code Section 21000 regulations and requirements.

description: California Vehicle Code Section 21050 regulations and requirements.

title: Lane Usage
description: California Vehicle Code Section 21400 regulations and requirements.

title: Traffic Signals
description: California Vehicle Code Section 21450 regulations and requirements.

title: Red Light Violations
description: A driver facing a steady circular red signal shall stop at a marked limit line, or before entering the crosswalk, or before entering the intersection, and shall remain stopped until an indication to proceed is shown.

title: Lane Markings
description: California Vehicle Code Section 21460 regulations and requirements.

title: Right Side of Roadway
description: California Vehicle Code Section 21650 regulations and requirements.

title: Lane Changes
description: California Vehicle Code Section 21658 regulations and requirements.

title: Following Too Closely
description: California Vehicle Code Section 21703 regulations and requirements.

title: Overtaking and Passing
description: California Vehicle Code Section 21750 regulations and requirements.

title: Right-of-Way
description: California Vehicle Code Section 21800 regulations and requirements.

title: Left Turns
description: The driver of a vehicle intending to turn left or to complete a U-turn upon a highway shall yield the right-of-way to all vehicles approaching from the opposite direction.

title: Stop Signs
description: The driver of any vehicle approaching a stop sign at the entrance to an intersection shall stop at a limit line, if marked, before entering the crosswalk, or before entering the intersection.

title: Entering Highway
description: California Vehicle Code Section 21803 regulations and requirements.

title: Entering from Private Road
description: The driver of a vehicle about to enter or cross a highway from a private road or driveway shall yield the right-of-way to all traffic approaching on the highway.

title: Turning Movements
description: California Vehicle Code Section 22100 regulations and requirements.

title: Turn Signals
description: No person shall turn a vehicle from a direct course or move right or left upon a roadway until such movement can be made with reasonable safety and then only after the giving of an appropriate signal.

title: Signal Duration
description: California Vehicle Code Section 22108 regulations and requirements.

title: Maximum Speed - Prima Facie
description: The maximum speed limit on highways is 65 mph unless otherwise posted.

title: Basic Speed Law
description: No person shall drive a vehicle upon a highway at a speed greater than is reasonable or prudent having due regard for weather, visibility, traffic, and surface conditions.

title: Minimum Speed
description: California Vehicle Code Section 22400 regulations and requirements.

title: Stop Sign Requirements
description: The driver of any vehicle approaching a stop sign shall stop at a limit line, if marked, otherwise before entering the crosswalk or the intersection.

title: Parking Prohibitions
description: A vehicle may not be stopped, parked, or left standing in specified prohibited areas including fire hydrants, crosswalks, and disabled access.

title: Parking on Highway
description: California Vehicle Code Section 22517 regulations and requirements.

title: Reckless Driving
description: A person who drives a vehicle upon a highway in willful or wanton disregard for the safety of persons or property is guilty of reckless driving.

title: Speed Contests
description: California Vehicle Code Section 23109 regulations and requirements.

title: Cell Phone Use
description: California Vehicle Code Section 23123 regulations and requirements.

title: DUI
description: It is unlawful for a person under the influence of alcohol or drugs to drive a vehicle.

title: Equipment Requirements
description: California Vehicle Code Section 24000 regulations and requirements.

description: California Vehicle Code Section 24250 regulations and requirements.

description: California Vehicle Code Section 26100 regulations and requirements.

title: Adequate Muffler
description: California Vehicle Code Section 27150 regulations and requirements.

title: Safety Belts
description: The driver and all passengers must wear properly adjusted and fastened safety belts.

title: Child Restraint Systems
description: Children under specific age/weight limits must be secured in appropriate child safety seats.

description: California Vehicle Code Section 29000 regulations and requirements.
